page.title: 17HOLME LACY -PEOPLE'S LIVES 3
page.content: The main changes in the village that people remarked on were that there were{more houses and more people,}and that there were{not so many young {people,}as the{younger villagers had {moved away}to find work other than farming. With fewer young people, the village was{much quieter. }Most of those we asked{work locally,}and the next biggest group are{retired. }The rest of those we spoke to - except for one who is unemployed - work in Hereford. {Most}of them{use a car}to get to work, though quite{a lot walk. Not many go by bus because the service is so bad (see PEOPLE'S LIVES 2). The same is true of{journeys into {Hereford,}to go{shopping},to go to {market,}or for{entertainment - practically everyone we spoke to goes by car, even though many would use a {bus if the service was better.
